description: Seya Riku, usually referred to by his surname, is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch23416 [Maho`s] who meets her when they enter junior high school. He is generally a soft-spoken boy who initially takes an interest in http://anidb.net/ch21554 [Shuuichi], whom he believes to be a girl, when they first meet. When he learns that Shuuichi is a boy, Seya becomes angry at Maho for hiding this and stringing him along, but he soon reconciles with her and eventually starts dating her.
name: Seya Riku
